Package cryptoTrader.priceFetcher

Class CoinDataFetcher

java.lang.Object
cryptoTrader.priceFetcher.CoinDataFetcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
CoinFetcherInterface
public class CoinDataFetcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements CoinFetcherInterface
This class retrieves data for a cryptocoin through the use of an API.
